name: findbypincode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool india_pincode_api.
Tool description: # 100% FREE 

## Allows developers to get accurate and comprehensive India PinCode & Places data from India Post Office
API description: Fetches information for a given Indian pincode using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

pincode.description: The pincode for which information needs to be fetched.
